author: Luc Olinga
title: Trump Claims He Built Crypto—Just as His Family Cashes In
description: The U.S. president now says he made crypto great again, just as his family stands to benefit from a booming digital empire.
content: In a series of bombastic new comments on June 27, President Donald Trump didn’t just embrace the world of cryptocurrency; he claimed to be its founding father. Painting a picture of a failing industr… [+3277 chars]
reworded_title:
on Crypto as a Weapon

That's not a typo.

On Tuesday, Trump's eldest son Donald Trump Jr. tweeted a statement that said he's "very excited" about the meeting between a Russian lawyer and a Russian government lawyer. It was followed by another tweet that was clearly a reference to the meeting between Russian officials and Trump's son-in-law and senior adviser Jared Kushner.

The statement reads: "Our understanding is that the meeting was a public one and was

He also says he's not worried about his company's financial future.
